mapper.insert: insert into bhs_article(aid, uid, cid, title, content, commentabled, appreciatabled, created, status) values (#{aid}, #{uid}, #{category.cid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{commentabled}, #{appreciatabled}, #{created}, #{status})

insert ignore into bhs_tag_relation(aid, tid) values
(#{aid}, #{tag.tid})
mapper.update: update bhs_article set cid = #{category.cid}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, commentabled = #{commentabled}, appreciatabled = #{appreciatabled}, status = #{status} where aid = #{aid}
mapper.select: select ba.*, bc.name, bu.name as username, md5(bu.mail) as avatar from bhs_article ba inner join bhs_category bc on ba.cid = bc.cid inner join bhs_user bu on ba.uid = bu.uid where ba.aid = #{aid}
select ba.aid from bhs_article ba inner join bhs_tag_relation btr on btr.aid = ba.aid inner join bhs_tag bt on bt.tid = btr.tid where bt.name = #{name}
select bu.* from bhs_user bu left join bhs_article ba on bu.uid = ba.uid where ba.aid = #{aid}

select ba.aid, ba.uid, ba.cid, ba.title, ba.commentabled, ba.appreciatabled, ba.created, ba.modified, ba.status, ba.views, bc.name, bu.name as username, md5(bu.mail) as avatar, bu.link from bhs_article ba inner join bhs_category bc on ba.cid = bc.cid inner join bhs_user bu on ba.uid = bu.uid where ba.aid in
#{aid}
select aid, title, created from bhs_article where status = 'PUBLISHED' order by created desc
